content: “Permanent and Temporary Upgrades” on page 320  8.2, “PU upgrades” on page 325  8.3, “Miscellaneous equipment specification (MES) upgrades” on page 332  8.4, “Permanent upgrade by using the CIU facility” on page 336  8.5, “On/Off Capacity on Demand” on page 340  8.6, “z/OS Capacity Provisioning” on page 346  8.7, “Capacity for Planned Event” on page 351  8.8, “Capacity Backup” on page 351  8.9, “Flexible Capacity Cyber Resiliency” on page 355  8.10, “Planning for nondisruptive upgrades” on page 357  8.11, “Summary of Capacity on-Demand offerings” on page 363 8 320 IBM z16 A02 and IBM z16 AGZ Technical Guide 8.1 Permanent and Temporary Upgrades The terminology for CoD and the types of upgrades for an IBM z16 A02 and IBM z16 AGZ are described in this section. 8.1.1 Overview Upgrades can be categorized as described in this section.
